title: Our Earth
brief_description: A study of the physical properties of the earth in relation to population density and industries. Beginning with oceans and ocean currents and their effects on climate, and consequently on people, the film goes on to show analogous effects of various types of coastline and harbours, lakes, valleys, plateaus, plains and mountains.
